missing_information: Missing/invalid patient/provider info, NPI, member ID, DOB, address, etc.
no_prior_authorization: PA/referral required but not present or invalid
not_covered_benefit: Service excluded or not a covered benefit under plan rules
medical_necessity: Insufficient documentation to meet coverage criteria / medical necessity
duplicate_claim: Duplicate submission or previously processed claim
coding_error: Invalid/incorrect diagnosis/procedure/modifier or mismatch between codes
bundling_edit: Bundling / unbundling / NCCI-type edit or modifier-related denial
coordination_of_benefits: COB/MSP issue; primary payer not billed first / missing primary EOB
documentation_request: Records requested but not received / incomplete documentation submitted
